content: hearty socks for working hiking or just staying warm toe increase round 1 *k1 m1l k to last st on needle this toe-up pattern includes thick yarn an extra-deep m1r k1 repeat from * once more 4 sts increased heel flap and ribbing on the ankle and instep for the toe increase round 2 k all sts best fit repeat toe increase rounds 1 & 2 another 5 6 more size adult small large to fit a foot circumference of times 48 56 sts 8 9 length can be adjusted while knitting if you are working with dpns you can shift stitches on yarn briggs & little durasport 80% wool 20% nylon to more needles whenever it suits but maintain the two 430yds per 113g one skein side points one of which is the bor needles 3 25mm/us3 or size needed to obtain gauge set up pattern k2 p1 k1 m1l k1 p1 k3 p1 four double pointed needles set of 4 or 80cm/32 five times k2 k to end of round 3x1 ribbing now circular needle for magic loop established on the top side of the sock plain stockinette gauge 24sts = 4 /10cm on the bottom side other tools darning needle continue in established pattern until the sock is 6 6 5 long or 3 3 5 less than the desired length of toe-up the finished sole toe gusset using judy s magic cast on https //bit ly/3rtuf9t cast gusset round a work 25 29 top side sts k1 m1l k on 24 28 sts total 12 14 sts on each needle to 1 st before end m1r k1 2 sts increase k 1 round gusset round b work established pattern plain with no increases © 2023 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v1 1 www galthouseofyarn ca repeat gusset rounds a & b another 9 10 more times bind off using tubular bind off or very loosely in ribbing 69 79 sts total abbreviations heel turn & flap k knit p purl work 25 29 sts in established pattern the next section k2tog knit 2 together is worked flat within the following 44 50 bottom side p2tog purl 2 together sts ssk slip 2 sts knitwise move both to left heel turn needle and k2tog through back of loop sl1 slip_stitch row 1 rs k 28 32 lli k1 turn wyif with yarn in front row 2 ws sl1wyif ds p 13 15 llip p1 turn m1l make one st left leaning m1r make one st right leaning row 3 rs sl1wyif ds k to 2 sts before last duplicated lli use tip of the left needle to pick up the st lli k1 turn stitch two row below the first stitch on the row 4 ws sl1wyif ds p to 2 sts before last duplicated right needle and then knit into it with the st llip p1 turn right needle to make a new stitch llip use the tip of the left needle to pick
